title: Goldman CEO’s Year of Empty Offices
itunes:title: Goldman CEO’s Year of Empty Offices
description:
Mike Alkire, CEO of Premier, discusses the state of the medical supply chain with the roll out of more vaccine doses. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Sri Natarajan talks about the story “Goldman CEO’s Year of Empty Offices, Island Getaways and Strife.” Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Managing Diversity Reporter Jeff Green unpack a new data expose showing how white and male some U.S. companies are. Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Andy Browne walks through his column about how central banks may be coming for Bitcoin. And we Drive to the Close with JJ Kinahan, Chief Market Strategist at TD Ameritrade.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
